name: The Net Researcher
tag_list: web-design, web-development, seo, social-media, smm, online-marketing, outsourcing, virtual-assistant, web-research, online-research
overview:
Started in 2011, The Net Researcher was incepted to meet the requirement of quality websites and development of unique and individual creative to match the market trend, to be heard loud and clear in the marketplace far above the clutter. Over a passage of time the activities diversified and the company made forays into other allied fields like internet solutions and support, online advertising, consultancy, IT outsourcing, ITES training programs, etc.

The Net Researcher integrated team is full fledged and comprises of your Remote Personal Virtual Assistant along with 24/7 backend support of the Web Research Team, Web Design Team, , SEM/SEO Team, Graphic Design Team, CMS Development Team, Word Processing Team, E- Publishing Team, and every team is managed efficiently by a Team Leader round the clock. The well knit team setup enables your TNR Virtual Assistant offer you a one stop shop solutions for all your outsourcing needs.

The Net Researcher is located with its offices in India and Canada and offers tailored offshore outsourcing services to customers across the globe, with customer bases in the US, Europe, Australia, Canada and the Middle East.
